mapper.update: update t_article set views = views + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.`name` as author, c.`name` as category from t_article as a INNER JOIN t_user as u on a.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN t_category as c on a.category_id = c.id where a.deleted = 0 and a.modifier = 0 and a.id = #{id}
